articles.author: Jesse Newman, Heather Haddon
articles.title: The Era of Rapidly Rising Food Prices Is Over
articles.description: Companies are dangling $5 burger meals and flakier biscuits to encourage consumer spending while trying to keep profits steady

articles.author: Alison Xiao
articles.title: McDonald's sales fall as inflation-weary customers turn away from fast food
articles.description: Global giant McDonald's has recorded its first drop in sales in nearly four years, as customers cut back on spending amid a cost-of-living crunch.
articles.content:
Global giant McDonald's has recorded its first drop in sales in nearly four years, as customers cut back on spending amid a cost-of-living crunch.

articles.author: Siôn Geschwindt
articles.title: Mobility giant Bolt adopts self-driving Starship robots for food delivery
articles.description: Bolt plans to roll out thousands of the robots across multiple countries, starting in its home city of Tallinn later this year.
articles.content: European ride-hailing firm Bolt will start using self-driving robots to deliver customers food as part of a new partnership with fellow Estonian company Starship Technologies, announced yesterday.  … [+2447 chars]

articles.title: Government to provide 5 kg free food grains to poor for May & June
